args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  ‖∑ k in range (n + 1), z ^ k / (k! : ℂ) - exp z‖ ≤ ‖z‖ ^ (n + 1) / ((n + 1)! : ℝ) * exp ‖z‖ := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex
open Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  ‖(∑ k in range (n + 1), z ^ k / (k! : ℂ)) - exp z‖ ≤ ‖z‖ ^ (n + 1) / ((n + 1)! : ℝ) * exp ‖z‖ := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex
open BigOperators
open Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  ‖(∑ (k : ℕ) in range (n + 1), (z ^ k) / (k! : ℂ)) - exp z‖ ≤ ‖z‖ ^ (n + 1) / ((n + 1)! : ℝ) * exp ‖z‖ := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex
open BigOperators
open Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  ‖(Finset.sum (range (n + 1)) fun k => z ^ k / (k! : ℂ)) - exp z‖ ≤ ‖z‖ ^ (n + 1) / ((n + 1)! : ℝ) * exp ‖z‖ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex
open BigOperators
open Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  ‖(Finset.sum (range (n + 1)) (fun k => z ^ k / (k! : ℂ))) - Complex.exp z‖ ≤ ‖z‖ ^ (n + 1) / ((n + 1)! : ℝ) * Complex.exp ‖z‖ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex
open BigOperators
open Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  (Complex.abs (Finset.sum (range (n + 1)) (fun k => z ^ k / (k! : ℂ)) - Complex.exp z)) ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n + 1) / ((n + 1)! : ℝ) * Complex.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex BigOperators Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in range (n + 1), z ^ k / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial k) : ℂ)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n + 1) / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial (n + 1)) : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex BigOperators Finset

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k / k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem exp_taylor_error_bound (z : ℂ) (n : ℕ) :
  Complex.abs (Finset.sum (range (n + 1)) (fun k => z ^ k / (Nat.factorial k : ℂ)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n + 1) / (Nat.factorial (n + 1) : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry
